lenders.occupational_info: I want to buy a motor cycle for hire as the population of passengers in my place is increasingly with no means of transport equavalent to the population.

lenders.name: Aya
lenders.loan_because:
I strongly believe that all people deserve to be happy, able to have chances, choices, and hopes. 

And Kiva is one of the hopes those hard workers see, and one of the tools to share the people a little I have. (very tiny though!!)
lenders.occupational_info:
Work for International NGO, Habitat for Humanity. 

----------------------------------------------------------
Fight Poverty Housing. Build A Home. 
Change Someone’s Life – It Could Be Yours 
----------------------------------------------------------

Habitat for Humanity(HFH) has built, renovated and repaired over 300,000 homes around the world, providing more than one-and-a-half million people in thousands of communities in countries and territories across six continents with safe, decent, affordable shelter. Its headquarters is located in Americus, Georgia, USA.

Habitat for Humanity Japan(Habitat Japan) sends over 800 volunteers to Habitat's overseas building trip called "Global Village" program to Asia Pacific countries, every year.

Global Village offers volunteers the chance to experience a unique camaraderie and build lasting friendships with fellow team members, and with Habitat home partner families. Global Village is a journey that will transform your life.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I believe in micro-lending as an alternative to 'profit before people' banking. And because I am fortunate enough to be able to.
lenders.occupational_info: I organise training for people who work in education - teachers, lecturers, managers

lenders.name: Jon
lenders.loan_because: maybe one day someone will loan me a buck when I need it
lenders.occupational_info: Works on computers by day in an office writing software, plays guitar by night in shady bars

lenders.name: Veronica
lenders.loan_because: I need too repair my kitchen because it is inwaided by ants.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of childrens when all the parents are at there work.

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: I want to support KIVA. As a successful entrepreneur myself, I understand how hard it i sto collect money to build your own business. As I do not have large capital to invest, I find KIVA an excellent tool to support entrepreneurs nevertheless and give them a chance to build their businesses. To help someone to help themselves is for me the absolute right way to fight poverty worldwide.

lenders.name: petrus
lenders.loan_because: I want to do many things for them (poor farmers) but I have limited funds business .. I also been running a low ...

I am very happy to do this because I can be satisfied in full. because they see the smile is the satisfaction I

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I think it's important to assist people who are working hard to improve the lives of their family.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that manufactures computer processors. I monitor the factory to ensure that each step is performed correctly.

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Kirk
lenders.loan_because: I love feeling like I can make a difference. That's enough for me.
lenders.occupational_info: I consult with businesses (mostly small business) to help them achieve greater visibility on the Internet. It's great work.

lenders.name: Jeff C.
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good to know I can positively affect someone's life and help them achieve their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I prepare medications for really sick people in the hospital.

lenders.name: Carrie Lynn
lenders.occupational_info: Support Arts and Culture

lenders.name: Cheryl
lenders.loan_because: If I have I lovingly give.
lenders.occupational_info:
After an accident I was unable to work ;My days of helping others thru Massage/Physical Therapy/Reiki...30 years...I never thought I would be the one in need of body,mind,and spirit healing.
I had a break-down and am alone; no family or friends-- Iam reclusive in social situations(So I was hauled into a psychiatric hospital )Broken in Spirit and body. 
I adopted from a shelter and took home too many kittens and cats. I found out quickly , I didn't know how to really take care of my fuzzy friends.
Many years have come and gone ; I see cruelty to Innocents and the deep pain I feel is unbearable. I advocate for cancer survuvors,so they get a quality of life; I advocate for animals so they too feel quality of life. 
I receive a stipend from social security;and just squeek by. God has given me the gifts of creativity and healing; helping others. 
I feel a powerful need to create art and music and poems to raise donations so I may give to others to love and shelter the innocence that I wish I could. So I have no children; Im 49,animals are my little loves and all Innocent animals;I pray for the dead I see on the country road side and pray too for the shelter animals in the local shelters as well. I donate  donate donate and eat rice and beans and potatos. I have the talent to create love in the form of art,music etc... I need help in getting my Love out in the form of note cards, stories,songs,poems, art and teaching manuals (for donations) so others can care and love for their pets properly. Ive seen shameful beatings of Innocence and screaming from animals that are in crisis--- I can only pray. I pray that my art etc..will be able to be sold everywhere like Kliban or 
Garfield so that I may help as many Innocent domestic and wild animals of all kinds be loved.  I teach others how to care for domestic animals, I need help to help others who care and would like to know how to care. My gift from God I give to you and Innocence.

lenders.name: KEEFUS
lenders.loan_because: We Are All Connected & I believe in "Paying It Forward". If my actions can bring about a positive change in the life/ lives of another/others, then I am truly grateful to have an opportunity to  contribute my part in such a change.
lenders.occupational_info:
Call me a dreamer!,But I'd like to think that creating & sharing my music with the world may help to remind people that we are all spiritual beings struggling with the human experience. "All We Need Is Love"
"We Are What We Think,
All That We Are Arises With Our   Thoughts, With Our Thoughts We Make The World"!!!!!! Peace & Blessings To All

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: It just feels like a natural thing to do. Fate often determines which opportunities are open to us… I admire those who make the best of limited opportunities.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an independent technology sales company involved in selling electronic components and Chinese manufacturing services to UK clients

lenders.name: Guido Struben
lenders.loan_because: I've traveled to various third world countries and experienced the poverty there first hand.  I would like to help people in these types of conditions around the world to help themselves.

lenders.name: Altrusa of Montrose CO
lenders.loan_because: Altrusa is an international service organization which provides community service, enhances leadership and personal development, and encourages fellowship.  Our vision:  Giving the gifts of leadership and service to communities worldwide.
lenders.occupational_info: We do many volunteer projects to help people in our own community as well as around the world.  Our primary focus is on Literacy, but we also have many projects related to health, education, environment, and much more.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: A little bit of money can really help change someone else's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I install and maintain workstations and servers for a K-12 school district.

lenders.name: jacob
lenders.loan_because: i would like to help people have a chance like i did once.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a fast food resturant.  I have been in management for 5 years and have lots of experience

lenders.name: Nacho
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a great way to really help developing communities in a much more effective way than traditional NGO donations. The fact of virtually meeting the loan receiver, believe in his/her story and commit to it is key in the success of Kiva.

lenders.name: Hugh
lenders.loan_because: It helps people do it for themself.  Gets away from the big banks and also makes me feel good inside

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed with a wonderful family and good health. I lend because I can!

lenders.name: Discounted Golf Shoes
lenders.loan_because: The internet has been an amazing gift to me and has allowed me to survive through thick and thin. It has provided for my family and I am looking to pay it forward when I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I run online stores and marketing for companies including myself.

lenders.name: JimmyP
lenders.loan_because: I have been hard working and conservative in my life and I appreciate the opportunity to give some back to others who are willing to work for it as I did.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: A public speaker in college who founded a major MicroLending company inspired me to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: Create new and inventive ways for companies to analyze their business.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: it is my responsibility to do good, to help rebuild the world as it was created to be. I've lived in many places with no place to call my home community; so, I see the whole world as my community in which to make a difference!
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying for a PhD in Communication Studies (especially in Health Communication) and I teach basic Communication courses such as Public Speaking, Interpersonal Communication, Persuasion, and Small Group Communication. I also conduct research to explore how communicated Message may bring Hope, especially to the oppressed!

lenders.name: Samuel
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a helping hand. Many people have helped me get where I am today. It's a way of passing it on.
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying at Fort Lewis College. I am majoring in Spanish and Biochemistry with the hope of going to medical school. I like to volunteer and help people and I think that the medical profession will allow me to do this quite often.

lenders.name: Gladys
lenders.loan_because: I want to offer a lending hand to someone who will help themselves with it. Because there were times I could have used a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I was an assistant to an executive of an insurance company.

lenders.name: Jahan
lenders.loan_because: I am where I am today because of what others have given to me. Jesus gave his life,  parents gave their love, teachers gave their talent, scholarship gave funds, etc.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach young people how to live healthy lives.

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.loan_because: God blessed me with many gifts and earthly materials, and I want to share my good fortunes with other needy people so that they may accomplish whatever they want to do in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I get to cook in a restaurant for a living. I love what I do; it is my passion.

lenders.name: Marty
lenders.loan_because: it is our obligation to assist the less fortunate and help their dreams of creating a small business come true
lenders.occupational_info: I am a small business owner.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: I believe that it is up to mankind to solve it's own problems.  If given the opportunity along with the desired drive anyone can improve their situation and lifestyle.  It is up to the individual to help others to improve their situation by providing them this opportunity.  There are no Gods or Devils, only man and his will for change.
lenders.occupational_info: I produce informational videos, low budget movies and advertisements for small local businesses.

lenders.name: Clark U. SE Class
lenders.occupation: SE - College Professor ( Dr. David A. Jordan)
lenders.loan_because: I teach Social Entrepreneurship @ Clark University ( Worcester, MA) and my students want to make a difference in the world ! (djordan@sevenhills.org)
lenders.occupational_info: I am both  a healthcare administrator as well as a university professor who teaches 'social entrepreneurship' to great students.

lenders.name: Roberto
lenders.loan_because: They would lend money to me, if I needed, if they could
lenders.occupational_info: How would I describe my job? When I understand it, I'll tell... For now, let's say that I'm a specialist of electronics, microchips and little silicon stuff like that. Is it clear, now? So, don't ask...

lenders.name: Meg
lenders.loan_because: I want to encourage and support people who take responsibility for themselves and their communities.

lenders.occupational_info: I was in a project for payment systems with chip cards

lenders.name: Danni R.
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I want to make a difference in someone else's life who is trying to better their life through work.
lenders.occupational_info: Web development and web site admin.

lenders.loan_because: I want to give of my fortune and help others
lenders.occupational_info: I work full time as an IT manager and parttime on my fortune

lenders.name: Lynne
lenders.loan_because: I believe in people's inherent ability to succeed.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I know a little bit of my money can make a big difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies come up with new products and services.

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: it seems like a reasonable, productive and human thing to do
lenders.occupational_info: I make comics on the internet

lenders.name: Kaitlin
lenders.loan_because: I want to see others prosper, it's what makes me happy, and it's what God wants me to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to college for 3 hours a day, and then I come home and study. I live a very blessed life, and that's why I feel I should give.

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: I want to be a better global citizen.

lenders.name: Dustin
lenders.loan_because: My philosophy of lending, especially when taking into account the global economy, is that of the avalanche. By helping out a small bit (as much as I can afford) for the right people at the right time, I improve their lives and their business. Consequently, the lives of those in their community are improved through their success. Thusly does a small snowflake tumbling down a hill have the opportunity to grow.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: I want others to have the opportunities I grew up with.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: It's fun and rewarding.
lenders.occupational_info: I help my employer to win projects that help people around the world.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I think this is an excellent way of helping people, communities, and countries.  Also, my parents cannot accuse me of giving somebody a handout.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop various computer models (charts and graphs), methods (web sites), and indexes (math equations) that help standardize (make the same) various industries and minimize administrative costs (usually the paperwork cost of doing anything) which makes the world far more efficient and cost-effective.

lenders.name: Tonny
lenders.loan_because:
I'm not alone in this world nor do I posses attributes that make me better than others.  I have been lucky, I was given support when I needed it so I'm just trying to do the same for others.
I come from Bolivia, a Third world country where many people need a chance to provide for their families and communities, I loan because I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a television producer, my works involves the coordination, direction and content of television programs.

lenders.occupation: cook, gardener, artist, maker of things
lenders.loan_because: it's great to share. I admire entrepreneurs and I really like to help people with their businesses in a small way.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a visual artist. I draw and paint landscapes and still-lifes. I also make experimental abstract paintings with colour and shape.

lenders.name: RochelleH
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate

lenders.name: Tilly McLain
lenders.occupational_info: The hostess of the internet

lenders.loan_because: I don't have a lot of money, but the little I do have can make a far bigger difference to those less fortunate.

lenders.occupational_info: I am a student

lenders.occupational_info: Trying to produce art with and through the computer and internet. Doesn't earn much money so far though.

lenders.name: Polly
lenders.loan_because: In the West we have so much, waste so much, yet can make a difference with so little.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I believe in being the change that I want to see in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I love to do ceramics. I love to make drums and fountains, and everything in between. I want to teach someday, but Im still in school, and until then ill do what i can to help others.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: God gave me gifts that I should give to his children.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I have the means to help.

lenders.name: Ginger
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed to live in a free country where I feel safe and am able to be successful.  I hope this little bit of help gives other people hope and a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: With the help of many people I build buildings that sell food and products to the public.  I love the people I work with and enjoy the challenge of fixing the many problems that come naturally with construction.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Philippe
lenders.loan_because: I believe in putting optimism into action.

lenders.name: Doc & Kristin
lenders.loan_because:
We loan through Kiva because it's an awesome concept.
We have been very fortunate in our lives so we felt that this is something we could do to help someone else become fortunate in their lives, too.
lenders.occupational_info:
His work is to help the company use computers to help their business.
-----
Her work is as a school librarian.

lenders.name: Joshua
lenders.loan_because: I always want to see people that are ambitious and driven have the opportunity they deserve.

lenders.name: Kyle
lenders.loan_because: I believe there is nothing more directly empowering than microfinancing.  It helps enable people to work for themselves using their skills to run a successful company and be able to take care of their loved ones all at the same time.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a Risk Manager for JPMorgan

lenders.name: Dave Ursillo
lenders.loan_because: Small love means big changes.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a writer and use my writing to help people think about their lives in different ways, hoping to inspire them to be happier, more charitable and giving.

lenders.name: Camron
lenders.loan_because: ... when you are in the service of your fellow beings, you are only in the service of your God.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with technology companies in the US installing and using Product and Portfolio Management Software.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: Aware of the interconnectedness of everything, knowing it is possible for all of us, everywhere, to lead lives of dignity and meaning, I  try to embody the ethics of personal and interpersonal responsibility.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach mindfulness meditation to individuals and groups.

lenders.name: Sam Daams
lenders.loan_because: A friend once lent me a little money when I was just starting up my first business. Not everyone has friends that can do that, but everyone deserves that chance I also got.
lenders.occupational_info: I own and run some travel businesses, both on- and offline.

lenders.name: Iris
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me and I want to use what he has given me to help others and I want to be connected to people from other parts of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I just graduated from university. I studied engineering and linguistics. I am currently working a few part times in education.

lenders.name: Ezequiel "Zeke"
lenders.loan_because: a lot people don't have what they need and I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student full time in the fifth grade.

lenders.name: kei
lenders.loan_because: Positive Karma!

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I am responsible for building, training, and nurturing a global workforce to help our customers' businesses.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I want a chance to give back, even if it's just a little.  I believe in empowering people who want to improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student studying biology and religion at Luther College in northeastern Iowa.

lenders.name: Sheri
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the Pay it Forward philosophy.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach and help others that have troubles managing thier lives after they have become addicted to drugs or Alcohol.

lenders.name: jin
lenders.occupational_info:
Flydragon tattoo suppliers company is professional supplier for tattoo equipments &body piercing jewelry at competitive price.what about your business recently? we will sent our catalog and details to you.
we would like to make business with you in future. I have a sincere thanks and bless my friend be good luck.
Best wishes for you!

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: Because I think that I live very well so i can make sacrifices of a few frills and extras that I have which could help to make a difference in someone else's life, and i think if more people did this then human suffering would be a thing of the past
lenders.occupational_info: I am just a high school student and I do not have a job. But out of the money my parents give me for lunch I plan to save some of it buy not buying extra food and breakfast in the morning, in this way I hope to save enough money to make a contribution.

lenders.name: Timothy
lenders.loan_because: If I can help someone I'm more than happy to. it helps me too.
lenders.occupational_info: I keep water and waste flowing. and stop the pipes from leaking. keep it all clear and tight and dry.

lenders.name: Brian Ross II
lenders.loan_because: I'm an idealist who calls himself cynical.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to Virginia Commonwealth University and am currently in the Art Foundation program there which is an incredibly dippy waste of time the administration forces prospective art students to do for some reason. There's a lot of work but most of it is stupid. Next year, I will begin a program in either illustration or sculpture.

lenders.name: Joy
lenders.loan_because: We all have to help each other.

lenders.name: Sharon & Tony
lenders.loan_because: Our generous friends and family donated money at our wedding in lieu of gifts. We have decided to lend the money through Kiva in the hope that it will help some people in different parts of the world achieve a better quality of life. The great thing is that when it's paid back, we can lend it out again ..... and again ..... and again!!

lenders.name: Tyler
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do

lenders.name: Leslie
lenders.loan_because: People need help and even though I don't have much to give it makes me feel good :)

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I love helping people, and I believe that a hand up is much more enriching than a hand-out. I don't have a lot to give, but this is a noble cause where even my small amount can be used effectively.

lenders.name: Little Hmong Babies
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people, the way I've been helped.  It's too bad Laos and China aren't participating in Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: I support computers and computer applications.

lenders.name: Yadira
lenders.loan_because: I want to be able to help others while God gives me the chance to be able to make a difference in someones life.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English to people of all ages and abilities.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I am convinced this is the best way to affect real change in impoverished nations without giving handouts.

lenders.name: d.Lewis
lenders.loan_because: .. pay it forward ..
lenders.occupational_info: help people when their gas furnace/ appliance is not working

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: others have helped me my whole life
lenders.occupational_info:
Mello Music Group is music for the soul, from the heart of American culture.  

hiphop.jazz.space.soul & fonk

"Sounds Beautiful like the Truth"

lenders.loan_because: My tithing money can be used over and over again...what an awesome system!
lenders.occupational_info: Designing roads and investigating drainage problems.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: it is our job to make the newspaper report something good one day
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student learning to become a doctor.

lenders.name: Luchino
lenders.loan_because: I firmly believe that people across the world need to support each other in every means possible.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as an activist trying to make my community, and ultimately the world more sustainable. I try to spread hope, peace, and joy as much as I can.

lenders.occupational_info: I am currently studying to be a doctor

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.occupational_info: I encourage people to vote

lenders.name: Midcat & Dave
lenders.loan_because: Many people have been kind to us when we desperately needed it, we want to help others. We believe in "paying it forward", and we treat others as we want to be treated.
lenders.occupational_info: We try to survive like everyone else in the world, we have 3 children of our own and an adopted son. They all live with us, and we try to make a good happy home for all. Midcat loves Cats, & Hamsters are Dave's favorite pets; you would think that we not get along, but we do! And love each other very much!

lenders.name: Tarek
lenders.loan_because: I do not believe in Aid money as a form of development but rather in foreign direct investments. People need incentives and a leg to stand on when the funding tap dries out.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as an investor in the global markets.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: "Being good is commendable, but only when it is combined with doing good is it useful."  ~Author Unknown
lenders.occupational_info: I monitor and repair a worldwide network that allows our many offices to communicate.

lenders.name: Danielle
lenders.loan_because: Love.

lenders.name: Jaime
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I help flight test large airplanes. We fly them beyond all normal limits to help make them safer for everyone.

lenders.name: Elin
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I admire people who have the ambition and creativity to become entrepreneurs, and because I believe that microfinance can help build a stable economy for individuals and communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as an in-house lawyer at an accounting firm.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: For all the good fortune that has come my way, I owe something in return
lenders.occupational_info: I work on computer programs and web sites that will hopefully make our Earth a better world to live on for all creatures.

lenders.name: Cullen
lenders.loan_because: I like this idea. I think life is about doing what u want, and if I can help people do that then cool. I want people to know that people around the world care about you.
